itunes:title: Episode 576 - Does Iran Think America Is Weak Now?
title: Episode 576 - Does Iran Think America Is Weak Now?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Hamody Jasim and start the show off by getting hacked by Iranian hackers. From there, the three discuss why America is so vulnerable right now, President Trump is practicing masterful diplomacy agains...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Hamody Jasim and start the show off by getting hacked by Iranian hackers. From there, the three discuss why America is so vulnerable right now, President Trump is practicing masterful diplomacy against Iranian threats, how other countries are keeping a close eye on America’s reaction to the Coronavirus threat, and how biological warfare could become the biggest threat to the world in the history of mankind.
